narrative.what: This is the Abmatic AI login page where existing users authenticate to access their account. You'll see the Abmatic AI logo, email and password fields, and a "Sign In" button.
narrative.where: This is the entry point at app.abmatic.ai/sign-in
narrative.howToGetHere: Navigate directly to app.abmatic.ai or click "Sign In" from the marketing website.
whatCanDo: Enter your email address and password to log in
Click "Forgot Password?" if you need to reset your credentials
Click "Sign Up" to create a new account if you don't have one
narrative.dataShown: No data shown - this is an authentication form.
narrative.nextStep: After entering valid credentials and clicking "Sign In", you'll be taken to your home dashboard (or the Welcome page if you're a new user who hasn't completed setup).
narrative.marketingContext: This is where your marketing team members will start their daily workflow in Abmatic AI.

narrative.what: The registration page where new users create an Abmatic AI account. You'll see fields for email, password, and company information.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Sign Up" from the login page or navigate directly from the Abmatic AI marketing website.
narrative.dataShown: Registration form fields - no existing data.
narrative.nextStep: After signing up, you'll receive a verification email. Click the link to verify your account, then you'll be taken to the Welcome page to complete your company setup.
narrative.marketingContext: This is the first step for any B2B marketing team looking to implement account-based marketing with Abmatic AI.

narrative.what: A simple form to reset your password if you've forgotten it. Enter your email and receive a reset link.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Forgot Password?" on the sign-in page.
whatCanDo: Enter the email address associated with your account
Submit to receive a password reset email
narrative.dataShown: Email input field only.
narrative.nextStep: Check your email for the reset link. Click it to create a new password, then sign in with your new credentials.
narrative.marketingContext: Useful for team members who need to regain access to the platform.

narrative.what: Your central command center showing an overview of your account-based marketing performance. You'll see key metrics, recent activity, and quick actions to common tasks.
narrative.where: This is your main dashboard at app.abmatic.ai/ (home)
narrative.howToGetHere: After signing in, you're automatically taken here. You can also click the Abmatic AI logo or "Home" in the left sidebar anytime.
whatCanDo: View your overall visitor and engagement metrics
See recently identified companies visiting your website
Check active campaign performance at a glance
Access quick shortcuts to create campaigns, view accounts, or check analytics
Monitor recent form submissions and conversions
narrative.dataShown: Key metrics include: total visitors, identified companies, campaign engagement rates, recent company reveals, and form submission counts.
narrative.nextStep: From here, most users proceed to install the tracking script (if not done), review identified companies in Reveal, or create their first campaign.
narrative.marketingContext: This dashboard gives marketing leaders a quick pulse on their ABM program. Check it daily to monitor pipeline activity.

narrative.what: Same as the home dashboard - your central overview of ABM performance.
narrative.howToGetHere: Accessed via direct URL or internal navigation.
whatCanDo: Same functionality as the main home dashboard
narrative.dataShown: Same metrics as the main dashboard.
narrative.nextStep: Continue to Reveal, Campaigns, or Analytics based on your priorities.
narrative.marketingContext: Alternative access point to the same dashboard view.

narrative.what: This critical page shows your unique Abmatic AI tracking script. This JavaScript snippet must be added to your website to enable visitor identification, personalization, and all Abmatic AI features.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Installation" in the bottom of the left sidebar, or navigate to Settings > Script.
whatCanDo: View your unique tracking script code
Copy the script with one click
See installation instructions for different methods (direct HTML, Google Tag Manager)
Check if the script is properly installed (verification status)
narrative.dataShown: Your unique script tag containing your account ID, installation status, and verification timestamp.
narrative.nextStep: Copy the script and add it to your website's <head> section on all pages. After installation, return here to verify it's working properly.
narrative.marketingContext: THIS IS THE MOST CRITICAL STEP. Without this script, Abmatic AI cannot identify visitors or enable any personalization. Make sure your web developer adds this to all pages of your website.

narrative.what: The accounts hub where you manage your target account lists. You'll see all your account collections/lists, their sizes, and options to create new ones.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Accounts" in the left sidebar under the Audiences section.
whatCanDo: View all your target account lists/collections
Create new account lists (from filters, CSV upload, CRM import, or AI recommendations)
Delete lists you no longer need
See the number of accounts in each list
narrative.dataShown: List of account collections with names, account counts, creation dates, and status.
narrative.nextStep: Create your first account list by clicking "Create Collection" and choosing a method (filters, CSV, CRM, or AI). These lists will be used for campaign targeting.
narrative.marketingContext: Account lists are the foundation of ABM. Build lists based on your ICP (Ideal Customer Profile) - by industry, company size, technology used, or import your target account list from your CRM.

narrative.what: A comprehensive data view showing all accounts in your database with detailed company information and filtering capabilities.
narrative.howToGetHere: From the Accounts page, click "View All Accounts" or navigate directly.
whatCanDo: Browse all accounts in your database
Filter by industry, size, location, and custom fields
narrative.dataShown: Company data including: name, website, industry, employee count, location, technologies used, and engagement data.
narrative.nextStep: Use filters to find accounts matching your ICP, then add them to target lists for campaigns.
narrative.marketingContext: This is your account intelligence hub. Use it to research companies, build segments, and identify high-value targets.

narrative.what: The contacts hub where you manage your target contact lists. Similar to accounts, you'll see all your contact collections and options to create new ones.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Contacts" in the left sidebar under the Audiences section.
whatCanDo: View all your target contact lists
Create new contact lists (from filters, CSV upload, CRM import)
See the number of contacts in each list
narrative.dataShown: List of contact collections with names, contact counts, creation dates, and status.
narrative.nextStep: Create contact lists to target specific personas within your target accounts. Useful for personalized messaging.
narrative.marketingContext: Contact lists help you reach the right people at target accounts. Build lists by job title, seniority, department, or import from your CRM.

narrative.what: A comprehensive data view showing all contacts in your database with detailed professional information.
narrative.howToGetHere: From the Contacts page, click "View All Contacts" or navigate directly.
whatCanDo: Browse all contacts in your database
Filter by job title, company, seniority
View LinkedIn profiles and contact details
narrative.dataShown: Contact data including: name, email, job title, company, LinkedIn URL, and engagement history.
narrative.nextStep: Filter to find key decision-makers at target accounts and add them to contact lists.
narrative.marketingContext: Find and track the buying committee at target accounts. Useful for sales enablement and personalized outreach.

narrative.what: Target groups combine accounts and contacts for advanced segmentation. You can create groups with specific criteria for campaign targeting.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Groups" in the left sidebar under the Audiences section.
whatCanDo: Create new groups with combined account and contact criteria
narrative.dataShown: List of target groups with names, member counts, and creation dates.
narrative.nextStep: Create groups to define complex targeting criteria that combine account and contact attributes.
narrative.marketingContext: Groups are powerful for advanced ABM. Example: "VP+ at Enterprise Tech Companies" combines account size with contact seniority.

narrative.what: Your campaign management hub showing all your personalization and advertising campaigns. You'll see campaign names, types, status, and performance metrics.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Campaigns" in the left sidebar.
whatCanDo: View all your campaigns (inbound website personalization, outbound ads)
narrative.dataShown: Campaign list with: name, type (inbound/outbound), status (active/paused), visitor counts, and engagement metrics.
narrative.nextStep: Create your first campaign by clicking "Create Campaign" and selecting the campaign type.
narrative.marketingContext: This is where ABM comes to life. Create website personalization campaigns to show targeted content to your ideal customers when they visit your site.

narrative.what: Track and analyze your conversion events. See which accounts and contacts are converting, and measure campaign attribution.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Conversions" in the left sidebar.
whatCanDo: Analyze conversion by account and contact
narrative.dataShown: Conversion counts, trends over time, attribution by campaign, and account/contact breakdown.
narrative.nextStep: Set up conversion tracking for key actions like form submissions, demo requests, or purchases.
narrative.marketingContext: Crucial for measuring ABM ROI. Track which target accounts are taking action and attribute conversions to specific campaigns.

narrative.what: Define and manage your conversion events. Create conversion definitions for different actions you want to track.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Manage" on the Conversions page or navigate directly.
whatCanDo: Delete conversions you no longer need
narrative.dataShown: List of conversion definitions with names, types, and event counts.
narrative.nextStep: Create conversions for key funnel stages: lead, MQL, demo request, opportunity, closed-won.
narrative.marketingContext: Map your entire funnel with conversions to measure ABM impact at every stage of the buyer journey.

narrative.what: See which companies are visiting your website in real-time. Abmatic AI identifies anonymous visitors and shows you the companies behind the traffic.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Reveal" in the left sidebar, then select "Accounts" (or it defaults here).
whatCanDo: See visit details: pages viewed, time on site, visit frequency
Add visiting companies to target lists
narrative.dataShown: Identified companies with: company name, industry, size, location, pages visited, visit time, and engagement score.
narrative.nextStep: Review visiting companies daily to identify high-intent accounts. Add engaged visitors to target lists for personalization.
narrative.marketingContext: This is ABM intelligence gold. See which target accounts are researching you, which pages they view, and how engaged they are - even before they fill out a form.

narrative.what: See individual contacts visiting your website. When enabled, Abmatic AI can identify specific people from target accounts.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Reveal" in the left sidebar, then select "Contacts".
whatCanDo: View identified contacts visiting your site
See their job title, company, and engagement
View their visit history and pages viewed
narrative.dataShown: Identified contacts with: name, title, company, email (if available), LinkedIn, and visit details.
narrative.nextStep: Review high-value visitors and pass hot leads to sales. Use this data for personalized outreach.
narrative.marketingContext: Know exactly WHO from your target accounts is visiting. This enables sales to reach out at the perfect moment with relevant context.

narrative.what: Create and view custom reports on your ABM performance. Build reports on visitors, campaigns, accounts, and conversions.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Analytics" in the left sidebar, then select "Reports".
narrative.dataShown: List of available reports with names, types, and last updated dates.
narrative.nextStep: Create reports for key metrics: target account engagement, campaign performance, conversion rates.
narrative.marketingContext: Build the reports you need to prove ABM ROI and optimize campaigns. Track engagement trends over time.

narrative.what: Visual dashboards showing your ABM metrics. Combine multiple reports into a single view for monitoring.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Analytics" in the left sidebar, then select "Dashboards".
narrative.dataShown: Dashboard cards with names, widget counts, and last updated dates.
narrative.nextStep: Create a dashboard for executive reporting with key ABM metrics.
narrative.marketingContext: Perfect for stakeholder reporting. Build dashboards that show ABM impact at a glance.

narrative.what: Connect Abmatic AI with your other marketing and sales tools. Available integrations include CRMs (Salesforce, HubSpot), ad platforms, and more.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Integrations" in the left sidebar (under Settings area).
whatCanDo: Set up ad platform integrations (LinkedIn, Google)
narrative.dataShown: Available integrations with connection status (connected/not connected) and configuration options.
narrative.nextStep: Connect your CRM first - this enables bi-directional sync of accounts, contacts, and activity data.
narrative.marketingContext: CRM integration is essential for ABM. Sync your target accounts, push visitor data to sales, and close the loop on attribution.

narrative.what: Interact with Abmatic AI's intelligent agents. These AI assistants can help with account research, campaign recommendations, and more.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "AI Agents" in the left sidebar (at the top, with the sparkle icon).
whatCanDo: Chat with ABM Agent for account research and recommendations
Research target accounts with AI assistance
narrative.dataShown: AI agent selection with available capabilities.
narrative.nextStep: Start a conversation with the ABM Agent to get account recommendations or campaign ideas.
narrative.marketingContext: Your AI-powered ABM assistant. Use it to scale your account research and get data-driven recommendations.

narrative.what: Manage your Abmatic AI account information including company details, domain settings, and preferences.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click the gear icon or "Settings" in the sidebar, then select "Account".
whatCanDo: View account ID and API credentials
narrative.dataShown: Account information: company name, domain, account ID, and configuration options.
narrative.nextStep: Ensure your company details are accurate for proper visitor matching.
narrative.marketingContext: Keep your account settings current, especially the domain settings for accurate company identification.

narrative.what: Manage team members who have access to your Abmatic AI account. Invite new users and manage permissions.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Settings" then select "Users".
whatCanDo: View all users on your account
narrative.dataShown: User list with: name, email, role, status (active/pending), and last login.
narrative.nextStep: Invite your marketing team members and sales stakeholders who need access.
narrative.marketingContext: Give your whole ABM team access. Consider inviting sales for Reveal access and executives for dashboard viewing.

narrative.what: View your account usage metrics and billing information. Track API credits, visitor limits, and subscription details.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Settings" then select "Usage".
narrative.dataShown: Usage metrics: visitors tracked, API calls, reveals used, and remaining credits.
narrative.nextStep: Monitor usage to ensure you don't exceed limits. Upgrade if approaching thresholds.
narrative.marketingContext: Keep an eye on usage, especially visitor reveals and API credits, to plan for scaling.

narrative.what: Define custom fields for accounts and contacts to track data specific to your business needs.
narrative.where: This is at Settings > Custom Fields (app.abmatic.ai/settings/custom-fields)
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Settings" then select "Custom Fields".
narrative.dataShown: List of custom fields for accounts and contacts with names and types.
narrative.nextStep: Add custom fields that match your CRM structure for seamless data sync.
narrative.marketingContext: Align your Abmatic data model with your CRM. Add fields like "Account Tier", "ICP Score", or "Target Persona".

narrative.what: Configure how and when you receive notifications about account activity, conversions, and system events.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Settings" then select "Notifications".
whatCanDo: Set up alerts for specific accounts
narrative.dataShown: Notification preferences and current settings.
narrative.nextStep: Set up Slack notifications to get real-time alerts when target accounts visit.
narrative.marketingContext: Get instant alerts when hot accounts visit. Perfect for sales follow-up at the right moment.

narrative.what: Export your Abmatic AI data for analysis or backup. Download accounts, contacts, and activity data.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Settings" then select "Export".
narrative.dataShown: Export options and history of previous exports.
narrative.nextStep: Export data periodically for backup or for analysis in other tools.
narrative.marketingContext: Use exports for advanced analysis in Excel or for data warehouse integration.

narrative.what: Configure the behavior of AI agents. Set context, preferences, and constraints for AI-powered features.
narrative.where: This is at Settings > AI Agents (app.abmatic.ai/settings/ai-agents)
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Settings" then select "AI Agents".
whatCanDo: Set AI context and company information
narrative.dataShown: AI configuration options and current settings.
narrative.nextStep: Add company context to help AI provide more relevant recommendations.
narrative.marketingContext: Customize AI to understand your ICP, messaging, and ABM strategy for better recommendations.

narrative.what: Configure Slack integration for real-time notifications. Get alerts in Slack when target accounts visit or convert.
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Settings" then select "Slack".
whatCanDo: Configure which events trigger Slack messages
narrative.dataShown: Slack connection status, configured channels, and notification settings.
narrative.nextStep: Connect Slack and set up a channel for target account visit notifications.
narrative.marketingContext: Essential for real-time ABM. Sales can get instant Slack alerts when target accounts are on your site.

narrative.what: A powerful data grid showing all accounts in your database. This uses AG Grid with advanced filtering, sorting, column customization, and charting capabilities.
narrative.howToGetHere: Navigate to Accounts and click "All Accounts" or go directly via URL.
whatCanDo: Use column filters to search by any attribute (click the filter icon on any column)
Multi-select accounts using checkboxes to bulk add to lists
Save filter presets for quick access
narrative.dataShown: Account data in rows with columns for: Company Name, Website, Industry, Employee Count, Location, Engagement Score, Last Visit Date, Technologies, and custom fields.
narrative.nextStep: Use filters to find accounts matching your ICP criteria. Select accounts and add them to a target list, or export for further analysis.
narrative.marketingContext: This is your account intelligence powerhouse. Use filters like "Industry = SaaS AND Employees > 100 AND Visited Last 30 Days" to find your hottest target accounts.

narrative.what: A powerful data grid showing all contacts in your database with professional information, engagement data, and filtering capabilities.
narrative.howToGetHere: Navigate to Contacts and click "All Contacts" or go directly via URL.
whatCanDo: Filter contacts by job title, seniority, company, department
Sort by name, company, title, or engagement
Create charts showing distribution by title/department
narrative.dataShown: Contact data with: Name, Email, Job Title, Company, Department, Seniority, LinkedIn URL, Last Activity Date, and engagement metrics.
narrative.nextStep: Filter to find decision-makers at target accounts (e.g., "Title contains VP AND Company in Target List"). Add to contact lists for personalized campaigns.
narrative.marketingContext: Find and track the buying committee at target accounts. Filter by seniority (VP+) and department (Marketing, IT) to focus on decision-makers.

narrative.what: Configure your Salesforce integration. Connect Abmatic AI to your Salesforce org for bi-directional data sync of accounts, contacts, and activities.
narrative.howToGetHere: Go to Integrations and click on the Salesforce card, or navigate directly.
whatCanDo: Connect to your Salesforce org via OAuth
Configure which objects to sync (Accounts, Contacts, Leads)
Map Abmatic fields to Salesforce fields
View sync logs and troubleshoot issues
narrative.dataShown: Connection status, field mappings, sync settings, and recent sync history.
narrative.nextStep: Connect using OAuth, then configure field mappings. Start with Accounts to sync your target account list.
narrative.marketingContext: Essential for ABM. Sync target accounts from Salesforce, push visitor intelligence back to sales, and ensure data consistency.

narrative.what: Configure your HubSpot integration. Connect Abmatic AI to HubSpot for syncing companies, contacts, and deal data.
narrative.howToGetHere: Go to Integrations and click on the HubSpot card, or navigate directly.
whatCanDo: Push visitor data to HubSpot timeline
narrative.dataShown: Connection status, property mappings, sync configuration, and history.
narrative.nextStep: Connect via OAuth, configure property mappings, and import your target account list from HubSpot.
narrative.marketingContext: HubSpot users: sync your companies and contacts for unified ABM data. Push website visitor intelligence directly into HubSpot timelines.

narrative.what: The modal for creating new account lists. Choose how you want to build your list: from filters, CSV upload, CRM import, or AI recommendations.
narrative.where: This modal appears over the Accounts page
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Create Collection" or the "+" button on the Accounts page.
whatCanDo: Build from Filters - Create dynamic lists based on account criteria
Upload CSV - Import accounts from a spreadsheet
Import from CRM - Pull accounts from Salesforce or HubSpot
AI Recommendations - Get AI-suggested accounts based on your ICP
narrative.dataShown: List creation options with descriptions.
narrative.nextStep: Choose the method that fits your needs. CSV for existing lists, Filters for dynamic segments, CRM for synced lists.
narrative.marketingContext: This is where ABM targeting starts. Most teams start with a CSV of target accounts, then graduate to CRM sync and AI recommendations.

narrative.what: The modal for creating new contact lists. Similar to accounts, choose how to build your list.
narrative.where: This modal appears over the Contacts page
narrative.howToGetHere: Click "Create Collection" or the "+" button on the Contacts page.
whatCanDo: Build from Filters - Create lists based on contact criteria
Upload CSV - Import contacts from a spreadsheet
Import from CRM - Pull contacts from Salesforce or HubSpot
narrative.dataShown: List creation options with descriptions.
narrative.nextStep: Choose your method. CSV for existing contact lists, CRM for synced contacts.
narrative.marketingContext: Build persona-based lists (e.g., "CMOs at Target Accounts") for personalized campaigns.
